subject: Unable to Register My Pedals – Plus X Pedal Control Box
description_text:
Hi Simsonn Support Team,

I’m having trouble registering my pedals and would like your assistance.

https://www.facebook.com/reel/23910970038552757

I have a similar issue to the one shown in this video (referencing the same
registration steps). My setup uses the *Plus X Pedal Control Box*, and I
followed the guidelines the image I attached. However, during the process I
encountered an error message saying something like *“this is not an update
for pedal”*.

Additional details:

   -

   *SIMSONN Manager version:* 2.1.2
   -

   The manager can read my pedals without any problem, but I still cannot
   complete the registration.

   -

   I am using VRAM Pro haptic as well

Could you please advise on how to resolve this issue or let me know if
there’s anything else I should try?

Thank you for your help!

Best regards,
Francis

[image: image.png]

conversations.body_text: Hi wf choi,  You only need to reinstall the firmware. Please follow the procedure and choose the plusx.sfu file to update and restore the system.

It work for me, thank you


service@simsonn.com
